article.headline: Mississippi St. 76, Holy Cross 75
article.story: GUAYNABO, Puerto Rico (AP) -- Jamall Edmondson made a 3-pointer with 4 seconds left to give Mississippi State a 76-75 victory over Holy Cross in the third-place game at the San Juan Shootout on Wednesday. Mississippi State trailed 74-71 but forced a turnover on an inbounds pass with 18 seconds left. Jamont Gordon made a basket to make it a one-point game. Alex Vander Baan made the first of two free throws to give Holy Cross a 75-73 lead with 11 seconds remaining. The Bulldogs (9-3) then worked the ball to Edmondson, who was open in the corner and hit the winning shot. Vander Baan had 21 points and nine rebounds to lead Holy Cross (5-6), which led 70-61 with 2:50 left. Reginald Delk led Mississippi State with 17 points. Edmondson finished with 12 points. Kevin Hamilton had 27 points and six assists for Holy Cross.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
